sourcesContent: import 'antd/dist/antd.css' import '../styles/globals.css' import { AppProps } from 'next/app' import { Layout, Typography } from 'antd' import io from 'socket.io-client' import { CSSProperties } from 'react' const HeaderStyle: CSSProperties = { position: 'fixed', left: 0, top: 0, width: '100%', } const ContentStyle: CSSProperties = { height: 'calc(100vh - 70px)', paddingTop: '64px', } const socket = io('http://localhost:3544') const MyApp: React.FC = ({ Component, pageProps }) => { return ( 안내면 술래 FreeVue Copyright © 2021 ) } export default MyApp
